attributes.action: scrap ideas to fingerprint under 16s for identity cards or passports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Immigration minister Liam Byrne confirmed that the government were 'look[ing] at'plans to fingerprint children aged 11 to 15 to ensure those with passports issued before they are 16 had there finger prints included. This is against fundamental human rights and is too draconian. We urge the government to abandon these plans
